title: Strawberry and custard tart
description: A perfect make ahead dessert for summer - sweet pastry filled with vanilla custard and topped with glazed strawberries.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need baking beans and a 20cm/8in tart ring.
ingredients: 3 vanilla pods, split lengthways and seeds scraped out
3 punnets strawberries, hulled and thinly sliced
